item.description:
I haven't scheduled a Meetup in awhile and we have a number of new members so let's get together to celebrate spring with a potluck and a movie.

I have a few ideas for the movie but if you have any suggestions please send them to me.

Looking forward to seeing old friends and making new friends!

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Spring Potluck and Movie
